title: Graves AA Bug with new blue upgrade trinket!
body:
Hey Guys,

thats my first post in the forum so im not hope i did everything right. 
The bug i found out is that when u aa with Graves in the vision-range of the new blue trinket update it will reveal a very very light flash. U guys can test it or it was only a graphic bug :P Hope u find out 

LG TFC Faker

replies.body: I randomly got that aa bug where everytime I aa'd the screen lit up. its annoying
